parameters.name: JobId
parameters.description: The ID of the deployment task. You can call the [CreateDeploymentJob](~~2712234~~) operation to obtain the ID of a deployment task from the **JobId** parameter. You can also call the [ListDeploymentJob](~~2712223~~) operation to obtain the ID of a deployment task.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The desired status.

Valid values:

*   rollback

parameters.name: WorkerId
parameters.description: The ID of the worker task. You can call the [ListWorkerResource](~~2712224~~) operation to obtain the ID of a worker task.
